## Introduction

In this part, I list the ldsc results for plier_allpathways factors.

I made several plots to show the enrichment and 95% confidence intervals for each lv. Enrichment here is the proportion of prop.h2 devided by prop.snp.


## Results-maf001

The covariants of the association test here are lv41,29,15,77,91,9,66,52,92(heritability = 0.000001, sorting by pval_test_l).

I performed ldsc for lv40,73(lowest pval_test_l from [prediction model](https://xsun1229.github.io/factor_analysis/train_plier_allpathway.html), 1.4e-4,0.0011,) and lv73 also has the highest heritability(0.59)

## Results-maf005

The covariants of the association test here are lv15,51,11,87,92,32,9,91,62(heritability = 0.000001, sorting by pval_test_l).

I performed ldsc for lv40,78(lowest pval_test_l from [prediction model](https://xsun1229.github.io/factor_analysis/train_plier_allpathway.html),, 0.00067,0.001,) and lv76(highest heritability, 0.91)
